# milkee-plugin-shebang

This is a plugin for [milkee](https://www.npmjs.com/package/milkee).

Add "#!/usr/bin/env node" to compiled files!

## Usage

### setup

#### coffee.config.cjs

```js
const addShebang = require('milkee-plugin-shebang');

module.exports = {
  // ...
  milkee: {
    plugins: [
      addShebang(),
      // ...
    ]
  }
}
```

### Run

```sh
milkee
# or
npx milkee
```

## Example

```coffee
#!/usr/bin/env node

console.log "Hello World!"
```

```js
#!/usr/bin/env node
// Generated by CoffeeScript 2.7.0
(function() {
  //!/usr/bin/env node
  console.log("Hello World!");

}).call(this);
```
